r.s: Class for accessing Vpopmail's vpopmaild daemon
r.d: Supports all vpopmaild commands, such as adding/removing domains, users, robots (autoresponders), and ezmlm lists (todo), as well as modifying domain limits, ip maps, etc
r.n: * Fix bug in setLimits() - use isset() instead of !emtpy() so you don't lose values of 0. * Some docblock updates * Fix login example
